course_name: Professional Issues in the Middle Years of Schooling
description:
20 days practicum and 15 days internship.
Professional issues in the Middle Years of Schooling will provide students with foundational introductions to the purposes and history of education and schooling, the social construction of the curriculum and curriculum structure, educational policy, early adolescent contexts, and current issues for the Middle Years of Schooling.
restricted: BEd(MYS) and GDipEd (MYS). Students are required to hold a current 'Blue Card' (Working with Children Check) Applications are available at, and should be submitted through, the Faculty of Social and Behavioural Sciences.
